text: Bohdan Smishko (; born 20 August 1978) is a former professional Ukrainian football defender. He is a brother of Ukrainian goalie Roman Smishko. Smishko started his football career at amateur level playing for FC Dnister Ovidiopol. ==References == ==External links== * * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:People from Cēsis Category:Latvian people of Ukrainian descent Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Dnister Ovidiopol players Category:FC Chornomorets Odesa players Category:FC Chornomorets-2 Odesa players Category:FC Enerhiya Yuzhnoukrainsk players Category:FC Zirka Kropyvnytskyi players Category:FC Spartak Sumy players Category:FC Zorya Luhansk players Category:FC Dnipro Cherkasy players Category:MFC Mykolaiv players Category:FC Oleksandriya players Category:FC Arsenal-Kyivshchyna Bila Tserkva players Category:FC Real Pharma Odesa players Category:Expatriate footballers in Sweden Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:Association football defenders
title: Bohdan Smishko
